author: Sergey Tsapenko <4031651@gmail.com> http://w3maker.name
name: sfsm
description: Simple Finite State Machine. Based on Javascript State Machine v2 (https://github.com/jakesgordon/javascript-state-machine/) By jakesgordon

scripts.test: TEST=1 ./node_modules/qunit/bin/cli.js -c state-machine.js -t test/test_basics.js test/test_async.js test/test_advanced.js test/test_classes.js test/test_initialize.js
